text:
And now, a word/sentence abut every member

S.Coups: I miss this hairstyle so much, it looks so good on him.
Jeonghan: LONG HAIR FOR LIFE!!!
Joshua: Didn't get enough screentime but damn is he beautiful
Jun: The whispering at the begginning is great, and he's so underrated
Hoshi: Bless you for this wonderful choreography
Wonwoo: THIS. HAIRSTYLE. MUST. RETURN.
Woozi: AN ADORABLE BALL OF FLUFF THAT IS INCREDIBLY TALENTED AND HE LOOKS SO GOOD IN THE ERA OMG
DK: His voice. His looks. His facial expression. Everything is perfection.
Mingyu: I just love him, I don't know how else to express it
The8: The other chinese beauty that deserves more screen time and lines.
Seungkwan: VOICE GOALS!! Makes me question my own voice
Vernon: SHFLSIJOAIJSFIJOJAIVJPJ *<--- Me being speechless*
Dino: Maknae who is so incredibly talented. WHAT'S WITH THE MAKNAES ALWAYS BEING SO F****** TALENTED!?!?. Side note: I just realized his hair was orange in this music video....

Can you guess who my bias is??? XD

author: @EtherealGlamour
text:
Just reminising: 
My first ever kpop video.
These boys didn't just drag me into the diamond life, they also opened up a gate to a whole new culture. 
I'm now studying Korean, making art featuring some of my favourite idols, and meeting so many beautiful people (aka Carats). And it started all because of them, this one video. 
I'm grateful to have been introduced to these 13 boys, they changed my life.

author: @kwonnnnari
text: i've commented in here too many times, but look how much their choreo has improved! in this song their choreo was mostly made up of adlibs and repeated steps. if you go to mansae, it's quite similar,  but they added more complex steps. and if you go to pretty u, it's like the beginning of where they fill the holes and actually start adding more dance steps, but still have a bit of that iconic seventeen impromptu dances (because of the musical concept) in which it stands in the middle, because it's the mix of the earlier eras and the upcoming ones. now, to aju nice and boom boom, (aju nice being the simpler one in this case) they really went all out and it looks cleaner than ever. i'm just so proud of hoshi and the rest of seventeen, of course. :)

1:35 - Joshua (Jisoo) - Vocal group, was born in america

text:
Can I please point a out a thing ?Â 
So, S.Coups is wearing a red "scarf"- i suppose that's what it is, attached to his trousers. So far so good. He dances, etc, until 0.32 when we can see that the scarf is lying on the floor in the background, probably because it's fallen off. Then at 0.35, it's attached to his trousers again, but at 0.36, it's still on the floor. At 0.38, one of the members( jeonghan i think) picks it up discretely, then we see s.coups dancing with it, and then, AGAIN, at 0.40 it's lying on the floor !Â 
No big deal really, i'm just being picky, but i was wondering if anybody else noticed it ?

author: @lisachiang2683
text:
For new people trying to memorize their names.
http://pledis17.tumblr.com/profiles

0:06, 2:30 - Vernon (aka Hansol) - Hip hop group, half korean half american.

0:09, 1:33(the one with the hat) - Jun (aka Junhui) - Performance group, chinese

0:20, 2:18 - Seungkwan - Vocal group (Defining point: rounder face and cheek bone.)

0:28, 2:22 - DK (Seokmin) - Vocal group (Defining point: longer face and has a tiny mole under his left eye (you can't see it in this mv))

0:40, 2:47 - Dino (Lee Chan) - Performance group, mankae, 99er (Red hair)

0:47 - Junhan - Vocal group (Long hair)

0:51 - Woozi (Ji Hoon) - Leader of the vocal group (Defining point: the shortest) (purple hair)

1:11 - Mingyu - Hip hop group

1:15 - S.Coups (Sung Chul) - The leader of the group and also the leader of the hip hop group (Defining point: his eyes)

1:20, 2:12 - Hoshi (Soon yong) - The leader of the performance group. (Defining point: v-shaped face) (blonde hair)

1:31 - The8 (Minghao) - Performance group, chinese (muti-colored hair)

1:35 - Joshua (Jisoo) - Vocal group, was born in america. (defining point: eyes)
(my opinion he looks like B1A4's Gongchan and VIXX's Hyuk) *(my bias)*

1:44, 2:50(the one with the towel) - Wonwoo - Hip hop group

I tried to add some defining points to help you guys recognize them, if you are having trouble with the times or just need help just ask, I don't bite! XD

author: @tatamigaIaxy
text: Jeonghan in those cuts when they were sitting on the car was so friggin pretty. I swear, this amount of gorgeousness is impossible to achieve. I biased him long ago during 17TV, but diverged a bit. I actually could not believe that the gorgeous long haired beauty was Yoon Junghan. I remember Doyoon, Samuel, Chinese cutie MingMing, and Dongjin, and waking up at 4 AM watching 17TV live, when I should've slept more. I am so proud of these amazing, unbelievably talented boys. I think Seungcheol and Jeonghan changed the most, from what I've seen 2-3 years ago. I also prefer this version over the actual MV. Seventeen fighting! I hope Pledis promotes them well, because they deserve to be much more well known for all the talent in each one of the boys.

text:
*Me after Exo, SuJu, and Topp Dogg*: Ok, no more big groups, they are two much of a hassle. You have to memorize all the names and personalities and it's so much work. Never again! 

  *Me after Seventeen debut*: ...Fuck. 


   I learned all of their names 2 days. 2 days! It took me two months to get Exo, I'm still getting confused with SuJu and Topp Dogg, but I can probably write a biography on all of them at this point! I'm in too deep, and there's no going back. These adorkable asshats have taken over my life.
